entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Configuration Binding inconsitent handling of initial values for unset options #94814
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Abstractions 8.0.0 miss net7.0 TFM #94812
  • [mono][wasi] Set the minimal set of FeatureFlags by default #94805
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasi] Optional wasm-opt pass #94804
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasi] WASI size improvements #94803
    9.0.0
  • XUnitLogChecker: Consolidate duplicated properties in coreclr and libraries into one place #94802
  • Could not use CreateFromEncryptedPemFile to load certificates when using dotnet 7 in FIPS environment. #94800
  • ILC and ILLink don't respect TrimmerSingleWarn in some cases #94799
  • NetworkInformationException: Permission denied (.NET 8 + Docker +GCloud) #94794
  • crossgen2 fails on FIPS enabled systems (due to MD5 hashing) #94786
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry(_ctxBase.Path, _credentials, _authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94781
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry(_ctxBase.Path, _credentials, _authTypes) becomes out of scope and is not disposed #94780
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry(_ctxBase.Path, _credentials, _authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94779
  • new DirectoryEntry(nativeMember) becomes out of scope and is not disposed #94777
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry("LDAP://" + dnsDomainName + "/" + GetEscapedDN(distinguishedName), this.Credentials, this.authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94776
  • SDSUtils.BuildDirectoryEntry( "LDAP://" + this.dnsHostName + "/" + this.defaultNamingContext, this.credentials, this.authTypes) is not disposed at the end of the function #94775
  • new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Domain) is not disposed at the end of the function #94774
  • new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Machine) is not disposed at the end of the function #94772
  • Domain.GetComputerDomain() is not disposed at the end of the function #94771
  • VS 17.8 MS testhost.exe crashing on .NET 8 with Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #94770
  • RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds in Blazor WebAssembly 8.0.0 #94773
  • Slow thread suspension in busy loop #94767
  • Escaped pattern in the summary of GeneratedRegex #94760
  • new RangeRetriever(groupDE, "member", false) is not disposed at the end of the function #94755
  • [VIRTUAL] Value link._sites.de, which has null value, is dereferenced inside function link.Sites #94754
  • Value (List<string>)value, which can have null value due to comparison with null, is dereferenced inside function _servicePrincipalNames.Load(). #94753
  • Apartment threaded IDispatch server throws `InvalidOperationException` or fails to marshal #94749
  • Support `Type.GetMember` usage analysis properly with IL3050 warning (NAOT) #94745
  • .NET7 NativeAOT worked for us right before updating today to .NET8, now NativeAOT is breaking on an error. #94744
    9.0.0
  • Vector512 CopyTo<T>(this Vector512<T> vector, T[] destination, int startIndex) incorrect #94743
  • Test failure _Avx512F_VL_Vector256_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F_VL_Vector256.Program.RoundScaleSingle0() #94739
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [Performance] String.IndexOf(StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) regressed 20% in .NET 8 #94713
  • dotnet publish with RID pull latest runtime packages and can fail #94763
  • [wasi] Improve error message for missing WASI SDK #94671
  • Performance Regression with .NET 8 (inlining seems broken in multiple conditions) #94750
  • Blazor WASM application migration from dotNet7 to dotNet8 #94806
  • .net6 custom string and long converters do not take effect #93385
  • JsonSerializer doesn't correctly deserialize readonly structs #94443
  • NullReferenceException sometimes in System.Text.Json on iOS/MAUI #93967
  • Add a TryGetOrCreate or other mechanism for safely indicating value isn't ready yet #36553
    Future
  • Native crash on System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn4.4.Tests net8.0-linux-Debug-arm64-Mono_release #88102
  • DateTimeOffset.Now throws exception on Android with Arabic language & western hemisphere timezone #94709
    8.0.x
  • DecryptContent(RecipientInfoCollection recipientInfos, X509Certificate2Collection? extraStore) should throw AggregateException #94769
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!(block->bbFlags & BBF_FINALLY_TARGET)' during 'Global local var liveness' #94680
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT iOS/osx/tvos legs are timing out on many PRs #93784
  • ExperimentalAttribute and ObsoleteAttribute are reported in non-consistent way #94761
  • Why DOTNET_GCHeapHardLimitPercent not working? #92113
    Future
  • GetOrCreateAsync will always execute the inner method and will cache the result! #54422
    Future
  • MemoryCache looses entries when SetEntry results in exceeding capacity. #61495
    Future
  • Add extension method to help set DI injectable `MemoryCache` with enabled statistics tracking ability #67769
    Future
  • MemoryCache PostEvictionCallback unexpectedly using the wrong ILogger scope #69428
    Future
  • Revisit MemoryCache design #36556
    Future
  • Need more Get function in the Cache class #36559
    Future
  • Allow direct access to ICacheEntry and make it thread safe #36498
    Future
  • Async work started in ICacheEntry scope can keep the entry alive longer than needed #42992
    Future
  • Multi-level cache #35044
    Future
  • IDistributedCache Support for `Collection` #36095
    Future
  • Make IMemoryCache fully generic to avoid boxing #48455
    Future
  • Windbg breakpoints on AOT binary induce crash #94650
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #94819
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 8.0.1
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #94818
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.15
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #94817
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.26
  • Enable dprintf logging for the whole GC #94816
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Unpin SdkVersionForWorkloadTesting like 'release/8.0' #94813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm64-sve
  • Add Monitor.WaitCount + EventCounter #94810
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support TimeSpan with RangeAttribute in Options validation source generator #94798
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Fix Vector512.CopyTo #94795
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Add empty SVE API for Arm64 #94791
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #94787
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Update System.Diagnostics.Metrics and System.Diagnostics.Activities ownership #94785
    area-Meta
  • Fix build issues with clang18 #94782
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the overwritten of reg21 when `pLookup->sizeOffset >2047` #94766
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • UnzipEven() and Count16BitElements() intrinsics for Arm64 SVE #94765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix declaration of DiagAddNewRegion #94759
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94757
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Remove exclusion for a test that seems to work #94756
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #94748
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94747
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #94746
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixed setting ReadMode to Message for NamedPipeClientStream on Windows #94742
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • [wasi] Run the mono runtime component selection logic for wasi #94738
    area-Build-mono
  • Pin to 8.0.100 #94815
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Disable Determinism test on NativeAOT iOS/tvOS runs #94793
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • update Alpine test images #94487
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Improve message when wasi-sdk is missing #94688
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix DescriptionNameTests.DumpRuntimeInformationToConsole failing on Mono on Windows #94788
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • JIT: enable complementary jtrue assertions for cross-block local ap #94741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94718
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94719
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-System.DateTime, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Optimize data flow used in assertion prop/CSE #94701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run CrossBlockLocalAssertionProp config #94783
    tenet-performance-benchmarks, area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps" #94807
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Implement emulate single step feature. #94711
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion #94613
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Calculate PackageVersionNet7 #94614
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Propagate value of PortableBuild property to Inner Source Build #94789
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] #ifdef out code that requires FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #94715
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Ensure that `JsonSerializerOptions.CacheContext` is a singleton. #94527
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [docs] Add Mono Library Mode and update Mono Profiled AOT #94578
    area-Build-mono
  • [main] Fixed DateTimeOffset.Now calls on Android with specific conditions #94710
    os-android, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Fix removal of unreachable BBJ_CALLFINALLY/BBJ_ALWAYS on Linux/arm #94751
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the help message in build.ps1 #92192
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update area tizen owners #94778
    area-Meta, os-tizen, community-contribution
  • Add support for specifying "experiment name". #94679
    tenet-performance-benchmarks, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update APICompat baseline version to 8.0.0 #94716
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94693
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add a warning to RD.XML docs #94752
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Char.IsAsciiLetterUpper comments #94740
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono-debug] refactor access to MonoDebugInformationEnc #94617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #94730
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #94729
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #94731
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Updated

  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94708
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94707
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94706
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • [wasi][wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage to the AppBuilders #94615
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize SSA #94672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][mono] imt vt_slot robustness #94705
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • try regMask to unsigned __int128 for linux/arm64 #94589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add etw event for Monitor.Wait #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add ConstructorBuilder implementation, integrate TypeBuilder.GetXyz() static methods #94732
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    no-recent-activity, needs-author-action, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Initial gcdump support #94673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Unable to locate repository with working directory that contains directory <dir>" even without SourceLink in .Net 8.0 #36926
  • dotnet cli -- Use a command to output everything about the CLI's capabilities #36925
  • `dotnet watch` broken in `8.0.100` #36918
  • `dotnet publish --tl on` fails with `MSBUILD : error MSB1009: Project file does not exist.` #36921
  • 'dotnet sln add' failed after upgrade to SDK 8.0 #36905
  • dotnet-ef installation fails since 8.0 release #36904
  • Unable to build sdk.sln on the v8.0.100 tag due to error NU1102: Unable to find package dotnet-format with version (>= 8.0.453106) #36900
  • 'LinkBase' ignored for items added in target #36899
  • Warning when building netcoreapp 1/2 with .NET 8 SDK #36897

Closed

  • How can I replicate a VS "Publish" operation in the command line, when COM components are involved #36778
  • dotnet workload fails to install microsoft.net.sdk.android.manifest-7.0.100.msi.x64 (33.0.95) #36658
  • .NET 7.0: Arm64 Docker build fails with NullReferenceException for TargetOutputs on restore step #29892
  • 8.0.100 SDK installed by `dotnet-install.sh` contains rc2 files #36884
  • .NET 8: New hash added to product version, can't find a workaround or find info about this change #36885

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2316617 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #36882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Open issue: nullability analysis of collection expressions #7626
  • Open issue: evaluation of implicit indexers in object initializers #7684
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Clarify return-only behavior #7692

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VSCode lang server should have a UI that tells the user when an extension crashed. #70844
  • Invalid IL generated for intercepted callsite #70841
  • Test CSharpCompletionCommandHandlerTests.TestNonBlockingExpandCompletionDoesNotChangeItemOrder failed in CI #70835
  • The SyntaxWalker API doesn't handle deeply nested syntax nodes well. #70834
  • IDE0305 "collection initialization can be simplified" spoils chained LINQ calls #70833
  • [Bug]: Cannot go to definition of source-generated type #70832
  • CSharpSpellCheckCodeFixProvider encountered an error in Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - Preview Version 17.9.0 Preview 1.0 #70830
  • [Bug]: 'Invert Logical' code action has malformatted message #70828
    17.9
  • CA2208 false positive #70824
  • ExperimentalAttribute and ObsoleteAttribute are reported in non-consistent way #70823
  • `IDE0028` suggests collection expression when assigning to a `dynamic` LHS #70822
  • Multiple errors are generated when using Quick Actions on a IDE0028 Message in .NET 8 #70818
  • IDE0300 false-positive #70816

Closed

  • Handle satellite assemblies in analyzer loader #56708
    17.9
  • Accessing InlineArrays nullable fields with ?? operator exited with code -2146232797 #70738
    17.9
  • ?. infers non-nullable struct #70842
  • Semantic analysis does not work properly in .NET 5 iff executed in a test environment #52954
    17.6 P2
  • Missing case in NRT control-flow analysis #70829
  • IDE0028 code fixer produces invalid code (build error, invalid syntax) #70826
  • Visual Studio 2022 formatting issue #65359
    17.6 P3
  • CS0121 call is ambiguous due to string beeing a candidate for a collection expression. #70831
  • CA1861 false positive in method attribute #70825

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ImmutableDictionary usage when passing telemetry property information. #70845
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Wrap calls to CompletionProvider extensions such that they go through our extension manager #70843
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Workaround vscode bug with returning defaultBehavior from prepareRename #70840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to using spans when doing SourceText.ContentEquals #70839
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add SourceText.GetContentHash #70838
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch IDE0005 from WarningLevel to AnalysisLevel #70821
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix race in AsyncLazy where we might not return a single result #70820
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #70817
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Handle deeply nested collection expressions #70815
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #70813
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Handle satellite assembly loading in .NET Core #70769
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Suggest installing exact matching .NET SDK in global.json #70806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Create real `NamedTypeSymbol` for private implementation type and use it as a parent for `SynthesizedGlobalMethodSymbol`. #70814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add docs explaining the semantics of SourceText.GetChecksum #70837
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to using SelectManyAsArray #70802
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix for source generator diagnostics not showing up as part of live analysis when generators run in OOP #70715
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Thread in a new MSBuild property `EffectiveAnalysisLevelStyle` to IDE code style analyzers #70794
    Area-Analyzers, IDE-CodeStyle, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Move to .NET 8 RTM #70846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 (copy runtime logic) #70808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove usage of SyntaxWalker and mark it as banned in roslyn #70811
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 #70723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix captured variables analysis #70810
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • 67328 - Update the casing of remove unecessary usings in lightbulb menu #70675
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Prototype] Show project-wide first party 'Code analysis suggestions' in lightbulb menu #70621
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor .NET 8] The same component instance rendered in different pages when using interactive mode #52102
  • Blazor - .Net 8 - Quick Grid - Sorting and Filtering Broken #52101
  • Authentication.WsFederation breaks with on-premise AD FS use #52099
  • Dev Tunnels not working with Blazor WebAssembly #52098
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, endpoint #52097
  • Blazor Server does not work after upgrade to .NET 8.0 #52095
  • .NET 8 : dockerfile not working #52092
  • [.NET 8] Page Title not being applied when using WebAssembly PreRender=false #52090
    Planning: WebUI
  • JsonSerializerContext not working with minimalApi #52088
  • HealthChecks stoped to work on version 8.0 #52087
  • BWA project template: "@" on @render-mode values and `.Client` project assembly discovery #52084
    8.0.x
  • A published blazor wasm app throws a serialization error "Unhandled exception rendering component: ConstructorContainsNullParameterNames" #52083
    8.0.x
  • [Angular/es-build/signalR 8]: The package "url" wasn't found on the file system but is built into node #52082
  • Enabled option "Do not use top-level statements" ignored in "Blazor Web App" template for WebAssembly client #52079
    8.0.x
  • .NET 8 behaves differently for JwtBearerOptions in AddJwtBearer #52075
  • Blazor.web.js broke since official .NET 8 #52074
  • <script>-tag in Razor pages ignored for Blazor WebAssembly .NET 7 projects (.NET 8 works though) #52073
  • "Error: URL.pathname not implemented signalr" - @microsoft/signalr V8.0.0 on React-Native 0.72.7 #52071
  • Allow JS.InvokeAsync<IJSObjectReference> calls to return null/undefined #52070
    Backlog
  • Blazor InputRadio is broken by IHandleEvent #52069
    8.0.x
  • Add an inputRange component like the basic inputNumber components #52067
    Backlog
  • Analyzer: ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning when targeting .NET 8 and using [action] #52066
  • Perf regression: json, json #52065
  • Switch blazor hosting model without need of a reload #52064
    Backlog
  • Blazor InteractiveServer Identity - AuthorizeRouteView and RedirectToLogin not working no matter what I do. #52063
    8.0.x
  • Allow passing base64 pfx content as HTTPS certificate #52062

Closed

  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcvanilla #51908
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapivanilla #51920
  • Use FrozenDictionary where appropriate #47569
  • ASP0000 warning when using `Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web` Sdk in project file #51926
  • [.NET 8] Kestrel no longer starts after update to .NET 8, but throws exception around 'Kestrel.Core.Internal.Infrastructure.KestrelMetrics' #52085
  • In WebAssembly pre-render false, is there a way to display a loading message while downloading the wasm files? #52076
  • Cannot use Razor Pages within .NET Blazor Web App #52068
  • Blazor Web App Router AdditionalAssemblies routes are forgotten on reload #52077
  • [Blazor] Docs on Blazor Web security #51577
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #52036
  • Add Quality parameter to BrowserFileExtensions.RequestImageFileAsync #32769
    Planning: WebUI
  • Kestrel hosted Blazor WASM large file upload problem: really slow. #30243
    Planning: WebUI
  • Simultaneous Blazor Hosting Models and switching at runtime #17678
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM and IdentityServer4 - AuthenticationState out of sync when using multiple tab pages in chromium #24979
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor's binding syntax and behavior is inconsistent, awkward and incomplete #14116
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #51728

  • Prevent delivery of events to disposed components #52057
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix the `::after` root component element selector #52105

  • Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #50969

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Cannot control unselected text color of tabs within TabbedPage #18775
  • [CarouselView] Review if we need to use CarouselViewOnGlobalLayoutListener #18774

  • The text of the buttons of an Alert is not displayed correctly in windows. #18759
  • [Android] Calling Android.Views.View.Post(Action) on a View that is detached and not then reattached causes the Action and RunnableImplementor to leak. #18757

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFC8: Lazy Loading regression on newly created objects #32314
  • Nav expansion visitor does not visit the non-lambda arguments (Skip, Take, ElementAt) #32312
  • EfCore 8: Primitive collections in JSON documents error with init #32310
  • Support types serialized as a JSON object or array in JsonCollectionReaderWriter #32308
    Backlog
  • 'The property is configured as an EF8 primitive collection. Primitive collections in a Cosmos model are discovered by convention #32307
  • Hi there #32306
  • EF Core 7 non-nullable string property with empty string throws `not-null constraint` exception #32304
  • Query: we don't convert JOIN to APPLY for query with subquery inside argument to Take method #32303

Closed

  • [EF Core 8] Understand why depencies to Microsoft.Identity.* packages #32313
  • Refactor DataAnnotationTestBase #24949
  • NRE when adding entity with an owned entity and `ToJson` configuration #32288
  • Convert more unit tests to use DI #26510
  • Oracle Index create and drop problem with efcore codefirst #32284
  • Translate Computed Properties #32276
  • Error CS8103 : Combined length of user strings used by the program exceeds allowed limit. Try to decrease use of string literals. #32261
  • Support CRUD operations for updatable views #32216
  • Sometimes generates plural instead of singular table names #32302
  • Fix test namespaces #29037
    MQ

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32300
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32299
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Adjust test class names and namespaces #32289

Updated

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.59.0 #32287
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Attempt to fix 32154 #32157
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Support BigInteger, Int128 & UInt128 #31778
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900
